thread.title: Joan Bakewell: Why it's not so great being a baby boomer
thread.title_full: Joan Bakewell: Why it's not so great being a baby boomer

author: Joan Bakewell
title: Joan Bakewell: Why it's not so great being a baby boomer
text: Property Joan Bakewell: Why it's not so great being a baby boomer As a new report reveals baby boomers are not all living the good life, Joan Bakewell says: 'Don't blame people for being born at a time when hopes were high and the country’s prospects improving' Joan Bakewell: 'When I served as the government’s Voice of Older People, between 2008 and 2010 I received countless letters from people entering retirement who were dreading their futures'
